rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Bulgarian veterinary authorities will cull 40,000 laying hens in the southeastern village of Krivo Pole after a bird flu outbreak was confirmed at an industrial farm there, the fifth since the start of the year, the food safety agency said late on Friday.

rationale: The segment uses moderate verbs like 'cull' and 'confirmed', lacking high-potency language.
statement_text: Bulgarian veterinary authorities will cull 40,000 laying hens in the southeastern village of Krivo Pole after a bird flu outbreak was confirmed at an industrial farm there, the fifth since the start of the year, the food safety agency said late on Friday.

rationale: 'will cull' is a future containment action. 'outbreak was confirmed' is a plain outcome verb.
statement_text: Bulgarian veterinary authorities will cull 40,000 laying hens in the southeastern village of Krivo Pole after a bird flu outbreak was confirmed at an industrial farm there, the fifth since the start of the year, the food safety agency said late on Friday.

rationale: The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
statement_text: Bulgarian veterinary authorities will cull 40,000 laying hens in the southeastern village of Krivo Pole after a bird flu outbreak was confirmed at an industrial farm there, the fifth since the start of the year, the food safety agency said late on Friday.

rationale: Reports actions taken and negative facts but lacks explicit calming language.
statement_text: Bulgarian veterinary authorities will cull 40,000 laying hens in the southeastern village of Krivo Pole after a bird flu outbreak was confirmed at an industrial farm there, the fifth since the start of the year, the food safety agency said late on Friday.

rationale: The segment reports culling and the number of outbreaks but does not use a minimiser with scale contrast.
statement_text: Bulgarian veterinary authorities will cull 40,000 laying hens in the southeastern village of Krivo Pole after a bird flu outbreak was confirmed at an industrial farm there, the fifth since the start of the year, the food safety agency said late on Friday.

rationale: The segment states authorities will cull hens after an outbreak, which is a factual statement, not a bare negation or explicit calming cue.
statement_text: Bulgarian veterinary authorities will cull 40,000 laying hens in the southeastern village of Krivo Pole after a bird flu outbreak was confirmed at an industrial farm there, the fifth since the start of the year, the food safety agency said late on Friday.

rationale: Describes an action to be taken as a safeguard ('authorities will cull 40,000 laying hens') without explicit reassurance.
